Tutorials
=========

|

Want to use twod_materials to characterize your own materials?
Check out some tutorials on how to get started!


Before running these examples, don't forget to configure your ``config.yaml``
file according to your system's specific paths and queue system.

.. toctree::

  stability_tutorial
  electronic_structure_tutorial
  pourbaix_tutorial
  friction_tutorial
  intercalation_tutorial
  magnetism_tutorial
